mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_cities (city, province_id, agency, agency_date, states) values (#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agencyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{states,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_cities set city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agency = #{agency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agency_date = #{agencyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, states = #{states,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select city_id, city, province_id, agency, agency_date, states from tb_cities
